message: I'm feeling generous, but I'm also pretty sure I can do better than this.
You're being too stingy, let's meet in the middle!
Let's split it evenly.  It's the fairest way to go, and it's better than us both getting less in the future.
You want to split it evenly?  I'll give you a little less, but I'll still get more than I would in a split.
This is my final offer.  I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I'm not going any lower.  If you reject this, we'll both lose out in the end.
